content: last 7 sts sm k7 row 7 k7 sm * k3 p1 knit into the stitch in the row below p1 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 8 k7 sm purl to last 7 sts sm k7 row 9-16 repeat row 1-8 --3 more times then work row 1-4 for a total of 36 row divider row knit 4 row slipping markers as you work stripe 9 mackeral scales by jen- 38 row row 1 rs k7 sm * k3 p1 k4 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 2 ws k7 sm * p3 k3 p2 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 3 k7 sm * k1 p5 k2 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 4 k7 sm * p1 k7 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es pm = place marker sm = slip marker rs = right side ws = wrong side tbl = through the back loop k2tog = knit 2 sts together p2tog = purl 2 sts together st s = stitch es kfb = knit into the front and the back of the stitch to make an increase p l y m o u t h y a r n® f989 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com page 11 row 5 k7 sm * k7 p1 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 6 k7 sm * k2 p5 k1 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 7 k7 sm * p2 k3 p3 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 8 k7 sm * k4 p1 k3 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 9-36 repeat row 1-8-- 3 more times then row 1-4 once row 37 k7 sm knit to last 7 sts sm k7 row 38 k7 sm purl to last 7 sts sm k7 a total of 38 row worked ending with a ws row top border work in garter st knit all sts for 12 row removing the markers as you work bind off loosely weave in all ends ©2021 plymouth yarn company designs by staff of the knitter s edge bethlehem pa 030921jbt abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es pm = place marker sm = slip marker rs = right side ws = wrong side tbl = through the back loop k2tog = knit 2 sts together p2tog = purl 2 sts together st s = stitch es = purl st s = stitch es pm = place marker sm = slip marker
